item.description:
Permaculture advocates, students, designers or just interested people getting together for a pot luck meal and a discussion of permaculture concepts, plans and actions!

Let's kick off spring with a discussion of our permaculture plans for the year - be they designing, learning, implementing, traveling, etc. I'll make a big pot of soup (I can do vegetarian soup...just let me know) and let's make it pot luck from there.

Looking forward to getting started meeting with everyone - esp since we're starting to install our own design this year!

For more information, see http://maps.google.co...

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: The Portland Permaculture March Meetup
